Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch 2.0 - ALAS2LIVEPATCH-2022-075: important priority package update for kernel-livepatch-4.14.256-197.484
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2021-4155:
	A data leak flaw was found in the way XFS_IOC_ALLOCSP IOCTL in the XFS filesystem allowed for size increase of files with unaligned size. A local attacker could use this flaw to leak data on the XFS filesystem otherwise not accessible to them.
